GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.15.33
GSD.description:
ice: fix 'scheduling while atomic' on aux critical err interrupt

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit 9b77c8cf69a41d1e3851370aeaa04a9ea83b865c, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 348048e724a0e8f08b63948d728d27596f6d3769. For more details please see the references link.
